content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Aziz Trabelsi

content: Hello, Mister Heine, nice to meet you. I understand that you are interested in renting out this apartment for the lowest price possible. I am open to negotiating the rental price with you and discussing my expectations. Can we start by discussing the current rental price and any additional costs?
name: Aziz Trabelsi

content:
The current rental price is 800 Euros per month. Is there room for negotiation? [

Hello, Mister Heine, nice to meet you. I understand that you are interested in renting out this apartment for the lowest price possible. I am open to negotiating the rental price with you and discussing my expectations. Can we start by discussing the current rental price and any additional costs?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Hello, Mister Heine. Yes, I believe there is room for negotiation. While 800 Euros per month is a reasonable price for a 25 square meter apartment, I am looking for a lower rental cost. Can we discuss any potential discounts or concessions that could be made to the rental price?
name: Aziz Trabelsi

content:
I can accept 750 Euros per month, but that's the lowest I can do.

Hello, Mister Heine, nice to meet you. I understand that you are interested in renting out this apartment for the lowest price possible. I am open to negotiating the rental price with you and discussing my expectations. Can we start by discussing the current rental price and any additional costs?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Hello, Mister Heine. Thank you for considering my request. Accepting 750 Euros per month is a reasonable offer and I am willing to accept it if that is the lowest price you can do. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate with me and I look forward to moving in to this apartment. TERMINATE.
name: Aziz Trabelsi
